str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To be possessed, be under the power of an evil-spirit or demon. Middle voice from daimon; to be exercised by a d?Mon.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
(lit: blunted) dumb, dull, deaf. From kopto; blunted, i.e. of hearing or speech.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From pros and phero; to bear towards, i.e. Lead to, tender, treat.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
